idea:
ANZEN is a Japanese word which means safety and protection. This is in alignment with the primary objective of the company, which is providing products and services in the area of Information Technology security and Risk Management. Further, “zen” is a part of the name “Anzen”, signifying balance, in line with the concept of risk management which deals with balancing Information security threats to organizations with countermeasures provided by our company.


ANZEN Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (Anzen) is a one stop solution for industry-leading services, solutions and products in the Cyber Security, IT Governance, and Risk Management and Compliance space. We provide End to End security services & Consultancy to sectors, ranging from Critical Infrastructure Installations to BFSI, eCommerce, IT/ITES, Pharmaceuticals and many more. We are strongly positioned to understand your needs and deliver the right panacea to your security and compliance requirements.


We have established Information Security Management Framework for clients from a wide gambit of industries. Our consultants are experts in their respective domains and believe in providing tailored approach to each client based on their business as well as technical requirements. We excel in executing Projects in timely and professional manner with world class quality. Our work truly speaks for itself and our clients are the strongest testimony to the quality of our services!


At Anzen, we provide end to end information security solutions which make a real quantifiable difference, adding value & assurance to business.

Our team has decades of experience & expertise in providing end to end security to sectors ranging from Critical Infrastructure Installations to BFSI, eCommerce, IT/ITES, Pharmaceuticals and many more.

Anzen is a unique blend of ethical hackers, architects, auditors and Information security practitioners working dedicatedly for providing best in class quality & effective services. By partnering with Anzen, your organization will be assured that security is not an inhibitor, rather an enabler in making your business more dynamic and competitive

Our Service Offerings 

Special Services

Critical Infrastructure Security  

Governance, Risk & Compliance  

Security Incident & Event Management    

Security Operations Centre (SOC) Consulting 

Incident Response & Forensics  

Red Teaming / Blue Teaming Exercises

Security Services 

Application Security – Web & Mobile   

Infrastructure Security  

Risk & Compliance Advisory
name: ANZEN TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Mintifi Finserve Private Limited (“Mintifi”) is working today with some of the leading industry stalwarts, across fields including education, manufacturing, retail, travel, etc. to solve the working capital financing needs of small distributors, dealers and retailers in India. The challenge faced by millions of small distributors/ retailers in India is that larger companies are not willing to offer credit to its small distributors/ dealers till they have not established atleast 1 - 2 years of operational track record. Even if they do offer a credit, it does not meet the complete requirement of the distributors/ dealers as the overall amount of inventory required to smoothly run the operations is generally much in excess of the credit exposure that the corporates are willing to take.
name: MINTIFI FINSERVE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: A start up intended to increase access to medicines and other healthcare products. Propose to set up retail assets to enable access to these products and leverage the supply chain integration to increase value to it's customers. This enterprise will thus enable setting up an integrated and organised framework in the highly unorganised, fragmented retail pharmacy set up in India by integrating retail assets, point of sales and supply chain.
name: Vistaran Health Care Services Private Limited
